Clip.Title: CORSICA: THE PEARL OF THE MEDITERRANEAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This series takes us on a journey to discover the island's history, its culture and its proud people.

Clip.Title: ALBINO UNITED
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Albino United football team was created as a way to bring albino people together with the rest of Tanzania. Meet the members of the team and learn about the ongoing problems facing albinos in this part of the world.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel on the most beautiful train rides and make fascinating encounters at different stops along the way.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Two military chaplains offer spiritual guidance to the troops in Afghanistan.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Ruth Wright's First United Church welcomes all those who have bottomed out on their luck in Vancouver.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of New Brunswick is an ecological wonder- this aerial survey soars above incredible rock formations, peat farms, and some of the East Coast's most impressive sand dunes.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: What does the Smithsonian have to do with food? Join host Tom Cavanagh as he learns to cook Native American dishes with the executive chef of Mitsitam Cafe; experience the American coffee break with the National Museum of American History, and visit the National Museum of Dentistry.

Clip.Title: STORIES FROM THE VAULTS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Tom Cavanagh as he takes you behind the scenes to examine the treasures, secret symbols, and coded messages that you can find at the Smithsonian. With the help of curators and other experts, we unlock some of the Smithsonian's most compelling mysteries.

Clip.Title: THE REAL STORY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: We take an in-depth, behind-the-scenes look at the CIA to see how a super assassin like Matt Damon's conflicted hero is created. We also probe the intelligence agency's controversial past operations, involving sinister mind-control experiments and often bizarre assassination plots.

Clip.Title: DESIGN TRIENNIEL
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Join host Susan Spencer as we enter the Cooper Hewitt National Design Museum, where curators have assembled a remarkable collection of groundbreaking innovations that are making the world safer, more comfortable, and energy efficient.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Vasto to Barrea, between the Adriatic and the Appenines, there lie two Italian regions that are intimately linked and where tourism becomes discovery of small villages, National Parks and art cities.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From Castel San Vincenzo to Sepino
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Castel San Vincenzo to Sepino we continue our journey from the costal beaches to the mountain plateau of Gran Sasso and Majella and the National Park of Abruzzo, Lazio and Molise.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.Episode: Windows to Other Worlds - Fountain of Creation
Clip.EpisodeSummary: How humans discovered the planets and how a few moving lights in the sky became a rich and complex solar system.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Mercury offers us a look at a solid world and the forces that shape it. With substantially more matter and a thicker atmosphere, Venus tells an even more complex story.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Future Firefighters & Improving Life for Darfur Refugees
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: HUMAN ORIGINS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: More than 285 early-human fossils and artifacts from 48 different countries tell the story our six-million-year-old history.
